scripts.test: npm run build && echo "Do some validations..." && npm run test-links
scripts.test-links: pm2 -s stop hs || true && pm2 -s delete hs || true && pm2 -f start `which hs` -- -p 8080 . && blc -s -r --input http://127.0.0.1:8080/$CONFIG_REPO | tee /dev/tty | grep -z '. 0 broken\.[[:space:]]\+Elapsed'
scripts.deploy-push: cd $CONFIG_REPO && git init && git config user.email "$GIT_EMAIL" && git config user.name "$GIT_NAME" && git remote add upstream https://${GH_USERNAME}:${GH_TOKEN}@github.com/${CONFIG_OWNER}/${CONFIG_REPO}.git && git fetch upstream && git reset upstream/gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add -A . && git commit -a -m "Travis build $TRAVIS_BUILD_NUMBER" && git push --quiet upstream HEAD:gh-pages
scripts.prebuild: if [ $TRAVIS_PULL_REQUEST ] ; then TRAVIS_BRANCH=$TRAVIS_COMMIT ; fi && echo "github:\n  current_branch: $TRAVIS_BRANCH" > _branch.yml
